mapper.select: SELECT data.* FROM IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA data LEFT JOIN iomci.iom_ci_info info ON info.id = data.id WHERE info.CI_CODE=#{did} AND data.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId})
${sql}

SELECT CI_TYPE_MC, I.CI_CODE as ciCode, IFNULL(I.CI_NAME,I.CI_CODE) as ciName, concat(D.ID) as ci_id, concat(D.CI_TYPE_ID) as TYPE_ID, DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9, DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17, DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23,DATA_24,DATA_25, DATA_26,DATA_27,DATA_28,DATA_29,DATA_30,DATA_31,DATA_32,DATA_33, DATA_34,DATA_35, DATA_36, DATA_37, DATA_38, DATA_39, DATA_40, DATA_41, DATA_42, DATA_43, DATA_44, DATA_45, DATA_46, DATA_47, DATA_48, DATA_49, DATA_50, DATA_51, DATA_52, DATA_53, DATA_54, DATA_55, DATA_56, DATA_57, DATA_58, DATA_59, DATA_60, DATA_61, DATA_62, DATA_63, DATA_64, DATA_65, DATA_66, DATA_67, DATA_68, DATA_69, DATA_70, DATA_71, DATA_72, DATA_73, DATA_74, DATA_75, DATA_76, DATA_77, DATA_78, DATA_79, DATA_80, DATA_81, DATA_82, DATA_83, DATA_84, DATA_85, DATA_86, DATA_87, DATA_88, DATA_89, DATA_90, DATA_91, DATA_92, DATA_93, DATA_94, DATA_95, DATA_96, DATA_97, DATA_98, DATA_99, DATA_100, DATA_101, DATA_102, DATA_103, DATA_104, DATA_105, DATA_106, DATA_107, DATA_108, DATA_109, DATA_110, DATA_111, DATA_112, DATA_113, DATA_114, DATA_115, DATA_116, DATA_117, DATA_118, DATA_119, DATA_120, DATA_121, DATA_122, DATA_123, DATA_124, DATA_125, DATA_126, DATA_127, DATA_128, DATA_129, DATA_130, DATA_131, DATA_132, DATA_133, DATA_134, DATA_135, DATA_136, DATA_137, DATA_138, DATA_139, DATA_140, DATA_141, DATA_142, DATA_143, DATA_144, DATA_145, DATA_146, DATA_147, DATA_148, DATA_149, DATA_150, DATA_151, DATA_152, DATA_153, DATA_154, DATA_155, DATA_156, DATA_157, DATA_158, DATA_159, DATA_160, DATA_161, DATA_162, DATA_163, DATA_164, DATA_165, DATA_166, DATA_167, DATA_168, DATA_169, DATA_170, DATA_171, DATA_172, DATA_173, DATA_174, DATA_175, DATA_176, DATA_177, DATA_178, DATA_179, DATA_180, DATA_181, DATA_182, DATA_183, DATA_184, DATA_185, DATA_186, DATA_187, DATA_188, DATA_189, DATA_190, DATA_191, DATA_192, DATA_193, DATA_194, DATA_195, DATA_196, DATA_197, DATA_198, DATA_199, T.CI_TYPE_ICON as CI_TYPE_ICON FROM IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE AS T INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA D ON T.ID = D.CI_TYPE_ID AND D.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_INFO I ON D.ID = I.ID AND I.YXBZ = 1 AND I.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) WHERE T.YXBZ=1
AND D.CI_TYPE_ID in
#{item}
AND T.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId})
AND I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
OR I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND D.CI_TYPE_ID not in
#{item}
order by D.id desc

SELECT iom_ci_info.ID id, iom_ci_info.CI_CODE ciCode, IFNULL(iom_ci_info.CI_NAME,iom_ci_info.CI_CODE) ciName, iom_ci_info.CI_DESC ciDesc, iom_ci_info.CI_TYPE_ID ciTypeId, iom_ci_info.SOURCE_ID sourceId, iom_ci_info.OWNER_ID ownerId, iom_ci_info.ORG_ID orgId, iom_ci_info.CI_VERSION ciVersion, iom_ci_info.CJR_ID cjrId, iom_ci_info.CJSJ cjsj, iom_ci_info.XGR_ID xgrId, iom_ci_info.XGSJ xgsj, iom_ci_info.YXBZ yxbz, iom_ci_info.DOMAIN_ID domainId FROM iom_ci_info where iom_ci_info.YXBZ=1
and iom_ci_info.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId})
and (iom_ci_info.CI_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{ciName},'%') or iom_ci_info.CI_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{ciName},'%'))

SELECT CI_TYPE_MC ciTypeMc,I.CI_CODE ciCode,IFNULL(I.CI_NAME,I.CI_CODE) ciName,concat(D.ID) as ciId,concat(D.CI_TYPE_ID) as typeId, DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9, DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17, DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23,DATA_24,DATA_25, DATA_26,DATA_27,DATA_28,DATA_29,DATA_30,DATA_31,DATA_32,DATA_33, DATA_34,DATA_35 DATA_36, DATA_37, DATA_38, DATA_39, DATA_40, DATA_41, DATA_42, DATA_43, DATA_44, DATA_45, DATA_46, DATA_47, DATA_48, DATA_49, DATA_50, DATA_51, DATA_52, DATA_53, DATA_54, DATA_55, DATA_100, DATA_101, DATA_102, DATA_103, DATA_104, DATA_105, DATA_106, DATA_107, DATA_108, DATA_109, DATA_110, DATA_111, DATA_112, DATA_113, DATA_114, DATA_115, DATA_116, DATA_117, DATA_118, DATA_119, DATA_120, DATA_121, DATA_122, DATA_123, DATA_124, DATA_125, DATA_126, DATA_127, DATA_128, DATA_129, DATA_130, DATA_131, DATA_132, DATA_133, DATA_134, DATA_135, DATA_136, DATA_137, DATA_138, DATA_139, DATA_140, DATA_141, DATA_142, DATA_143, DATA_144, DATA_145, DATA_146, DATA_147, DATA_148, DATA_149, DATA_150, DATA_151, DATA_152, DATA_153, DATA_154, DATA_155, DATA_156, DATA_157, DATA_158, DATA_159, DATA_160, DATA_161, DATA_162, DATA_163, DATA_164, DATA_165, DATA_166, DATA_167, DATA_168, DATA_169, DATA_170, DATA_171, DATA_172, DATA_173, DATA_174, DATA_175, DATA_176, DATA_177, DATA_178, DATA_179, FROM IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE AS T INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA D ON T.ID = D.CI_TYPE_ID AND D.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_INFO I ON D.ID = I.ID AND I.YXBZ = 1 AND I.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) WHERE T.YXBZ=1
AND D.CI_TYPE_ID in
#{item}
AND T.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId})
AND I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
OR I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
order by D.id desc

SELECT count(1) num FROM IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE AS T INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA D ON T.ID = D.CI_TYPE_ID AND D.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_INFO I ON D.ID = I.ID AND I.YXBZ = 1 AND I.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) WHERE T.YXBZ=1
AND D.CI_TYPE_ID in
#{item}
AND T.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId})
AND I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
OR I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND D.CI_TYPE_ID not in
#{item}
order by D.id desc

select distinct (select CI_TYPE_MC from IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE where id= IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA.CI_TYPE_ID) as CI_TYPE_MC , CI_TYPE_ID from IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA where id in (select TARGET_CI_ID from IOMCI.IOM_CI_DATA_REL where SOURCE_CI_ID=#{id})
${sql}

select ${attrId} from iom_ci_type_data where ID = #{ciId}
select * from iomci.iom_ci_type_data_index where IDX in #{item.id}
select * from iomci.iom_ci_type_data where ID = #{ci_id} and CI_TYPE_ID = #{tid}
${sql}

select * from iomci.iom_ci_info where id in
#{item}

select DATA_1, DATA_2, DATA_3, DATA_4, DATA_5, DATA_6, DATA_7, DATA_8, DATA_9, DATA_10, DATA_11, DATA_12, DATA_13, DATA_14, DATA_15, DATA_16, DATA_17, DATA_18, DATA_19, DATA_20, DATA_21, DATA_22, DATA_23, DATA_24, DATA_25, DATA_26, DATA_27, DATA_28, DATA_29, DATA_30, DATA_31, DATA_32, DATA_33, DATA_34, DATA_35, DATA_36, DATA_37, DATA_38, DATA_39, DATA_40, DATA_41, DATA_42, DATA_43, DATA_44, DATA_45, DATA_46, DATA_47, DATA_48, DATA_49, DATA_50, DATA_51, DATA_52, DATA_53, DATA_54, DATA_55, DATA_56, DATA_57, DATA_58, DATA_59, DATA_60, DATA_61, DATA_62, DATA_63, DATA_64, DATA_65, DATA_66, DATA_67, DATA_68, DATA_69, DATA_70, DATA_71, DATA_72, DATA_73, DATA_74, DATA_75, DATA_76, DATA_77, DATA_78, DATA_79, DATA_80, DATA_81, DATA_82, DATA_83, DATA_84, DATA_85, DATA_86, DATA_87, DATA_88, DATA_89, DATA_90, DATA_91, DATA_92, DATA_93, DATA_94, DATA_95, DATA_96, DATA_97, DATA_98, DATA_99, DATA_100, DATA_101, DATA_102, DATA_103, DATA_104, DATA_105, DATA_106, DATA_107, DATA_108, DATA_109, DATA_110, DATA_111, DATA_112, DATA_113, DATA_114, DATA_115, DATA_116, DATA_117, DATA_118, DATA_119, DATA_120, DATA_121, DATA_122, DATA_123, DATA_124, DATA_125, DATA_126, DATA_127, DATA_128, DATA_129, DATA_130, DATA_131, DATA_132, DATA_133, DATA_134, DATA_135, DATA_136, DATA_137, DATA_138, DATA_139, DATA_140, DATA_141, DATA_142, DATA_143, DATA_144, DATA_145, DATA_146, DATA_147, DATA_148, DATA_149, DATA_150, DATA_151, DATA_152, DATA_153, DATA_154, DATA_155, DATA_156, DATA_157, DATA_158, DATA_159, DATA_160, DATA_161, DATA_162, DATA_163, DATA_164, DATA_165, DATA_166, DATA_167, DATA_168, DATA_169, DATA_170, DATA_171, DATA_172, DATA_173, DATA_174, DATA_175, DATA_176, DATA_177, DATA_178, DATA_179, DATA_180, DATA_181, DATA_182, DATA_183, DATA_184, DATA_185, DATA_186, DATA_187, DATA_188, DATA_189, DATA_190, DATA_191, DATA_192, DATA_193, DATA_194, DATA_195, DATA_196, DATA_197, DATA_198, DATA_199 from iom_ci_type_data where id = #{id}
select count(*) from iomci.iom_ci_info where CI_CODE = #{bm} and yxbz = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA set ${dataNo}='' WHERE ID =#{ci_id} and CI_TYPE_ID=#{ci_id};
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ID) as ciIds,${groupName} as zhi FROM `iom_ci_type_data` WHERE CI_TYPE_ID = #{ciClassId} and ${ciClassName} = #{source} GROUP BY ${groupName}
select ${mpCiItem} from iom_ci_type_data where id=#{ciId}

SELECT CI_TYPE_MC ciTypeMc,I.CI_CODE ciCode,IFNULL(I.CI_NAME,I.CI_CODE) ciName,concat(D.ID) as ciId,concat(D.CI_TYPE_ID) as typeId, DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9, DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17, DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23,DATA_24,DATA_25, DATA_26,DATA_27,DATA_28,DATA_29,DATA_30,DATA_31,DATA_32,DATA_33, DATA_100, DATA_101, DATA_102, DATA_103, DATA_104, DATA_105, DATA_106, DATA_107, DATA_108, DATA_109, DATA_110, DATA_111, DATA_112, DATA_113, DATA_114, DATA_115, DATA_116, DATA_117, DATA_118, DATA_119, DATA_120, DATA_121, DATA_122, DATA_123, DATA_124, DATA_125, DATA_126, DATA_127, DATA_128, DATA_129, DATA_130, DATA_131, DATA_132, DATA_133, DATA_134, DATA_135, DATA_136, DATA_137, DATA_138, DATA_139, DATA_140, DATA_141, DATA_142, DATA_143, DATA_144, DATA_145, DATA_146, DATA_147, DATA_148, DATA_149, DATA_150, DATA_151, DATA_152, DATA_153, DATA_154, DATA_155, DATA_156, DATA_157, DATA_158, DATA_159, DATA_160, DATA_161, DATA_162, DATA_163, DATA_164, DATA_165, DATA_166, DATA_167, DATA_168, DATA_169, DATA_170, DATA_171, DATA_172, DATA_173, DATA_174, DATA_175, DATA_176, DATA_177, DATA_178, DATA_179, DATA_180, DATA_181, DATA_182, DATA_183, DATA_184, DATA_185, DATA_186, DATA_187, DATA_188, DATA_189, DATA_190, DATA_191, DATA_192, DATA_193, DATA_194, DATA_195, DATA_196, DATA_197, DATA_198, DATA_199 FROM IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE AS T INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA D ON T.ID = D.CI_TYPE_ID AND D.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_INFO I ON D.ID = I.ID AND I.YXBZ = 1 AND I.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) WHERE T.YXBZ=1
AND D.CI_TYPE_ID in
#{item}
AND T.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId})
AND I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
OR I.ATTRS_STR like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
order by D.id desc
select MAX(SORT) from iom_ci_type_item where CI_TYPE_ID=#{ci_type_id}

SELECT CI_TYPE_MC ciTypeMc,I.CI_CODE ciCode,IFNULL(I.CI_NAME,I.CI_CODE) ciName,concat(D.ID) as ciId,concat(D.CI_TYPE_ID) as typeId, DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9, DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17, DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23,DATA_24,DATA_25, DATA_26,DATA_27,DATA_28,DATA_29,DATA_30,DATA_31,DATA_32,DATA_33, DATA_120, DATA_121, DATA_122, DATA_123, DATA_124, DATA_125, DATA_126, DATA_127, DATA_128, DATA_129, DATA_130, DATA_131, DATA_132, DATA_133, DATA_134, DATA_135, DATA_136, DATA_137, DATA_138, DATA_139, DATA_140, DATA_141, DATA_142, DATA_143, DATA_144, DATA_145, DATA_146, DATA_147, DATA_148, DATA_149, DATA_150, DATA_151, DATA_152, DATA_153, DATA_154, DATA_155, DATA_156, DATA_157, DATA_158, DATA_159, DATA_160, DATA_161, DATA_162, DATA_163, DATA_164, DATA_165, DATA_166, DATA_167, DATA_168, DATA_169, DATA_170, DATA_171, DATA_172, DATA_173, DATA_174, DATA_175, DATA_176, DATA_177, DATA_178, DATA_179, FROM IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE AS T INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA D ON T.ID = D.CI_TYPE_ID AND D.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) INNER JOIN IOMCI.IOM_CI_INFO I ON D.ID = I.ID AND I.YXBZ = 1 AND I.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) WHERE T.YXBZ=1
AND (I.CI_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{ciCode},'%') or I.CI_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{ciCode},'%'))
AND T.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) order by D.id desc

SELECT CI_TYPE_MC ciTypeMc,I.CI_CODE ciBm,concat(D.ID) as ciId,concat(D.CI_TYPE_ID) as typeId, DATA_1,DATA_2,DATA_3,DATA_4,DATA_5,DATA_6,DATA_7,DATA_8,DATA_9, DATA_10,DATA_11,DATA_12,DATA_13,DATA_14,DATA_15,DATA_16,DATA_17, DATA_18,DATA_19,DATA_20,DATA_21,DATA_22,DATA_23,DATA_24,DATA_25, DATA_26,DATA_27,DATA_28,DATA_29,DATA_30,DATA_31,DATA_32,DATA_33, (${domainId}) WHERE T.YXBZ=1 AND (D.ID =#{ciId} OR I.CI_CODE=#{ciBm}) AND T.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId}) order by D.id desc
select id from iom_ci_info where ci_code = #{ciCode} and ci_type_id=#{tid}
SELECT * from iom_ci_type_item WHERE ATTR_NAME=''
SELECT * from iom_ci_type_item WHERE ci_type_id=#{ci_type_id} order by sort
SELECT data.* FROM IOMCI.IOM_CI_TYPE_DATA data LEFT JOIN iomci.iom_ci_info info ON info.id = data.id WHERE info.ci_code=#{did} AND data.DOMAIN_ID in (${domainId})
